submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diffs = Counter([max(
            nums[i], 
            abs(k - nums[i]), 
            nums[n - 1 - i], 
            abs(k - nums[n - 1 - i])) for i in range(n // 2)])
        cnt = Counter(abs(nums[i] - nums[n - 1 - i]) for i in range(n // 2))
        res, bad = inf, 0
        for x in range(k + 1):
            good = cnt[x] * 2
            res = min(res, bad + (n - good - bad) // 2)
            bad += diffs[x] * 2
        return res
